content.raw:
I think it can't be in `ignition_no_pkg_yet` if we want to create a prerelease install job

I [commented on a line of code](#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/682/implement-explicit-platform-definition-for/diff#comment-80054568) that may be causing this issue
content.html:
I think it can't be in ignition_no_pkg_yet if we want to create a prerelease install job

I commented on a line of code that may be causing this issue

content.raw: It's being generated because we did not list rendering in `ignition_no_pkg_yet` so it is generating the installation of the non versioned -dev version by default just using the stable repo.
content.html: It's being generated because we did not list rendering in ignition_no_pkg_yet so it is generating the installation of the non versioned -dev version by default just using the stable repo.

thanks @\_jrivero_ ; the rending bionic install job is working now because of 576f4f0

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_rendering-install-pkg-bionic-amd64&build=45)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_rendering-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/45/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_rendering-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/45/

but for some reason the rendering xenial install job is still being enabled

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_ignition/661/
